allow: Bash(do sed -i 's/123 Health Street/2971 136 Ave NW #240C/g' "$file")
Bash(do sed -i 's/Carrington, State 12345/Calgary, AB T3P 1N7/g; s/Carrington, Calgary/Calgary, AB T3P 1N7/g' "$file")
Bash(for file in about.html team.html blog.html contact.html services.html physiotherapy.html massage.html chiropractic.html acupuncture.html osteopathy.html psychology.html dietitian.html)
Bash(do sed -i 's|Carrington Physio||g' "$file")
